name: Mob Mall Madness
description:
What is this?

Mob Mall Madness is an out of control game where you need to get the best deals on Black Friday! Watch out for the mob, they won't let anything get in between them and their sweet, sweet deals.

How to play:

WASD - Walk

Space - Jump

E - Punch/Throw

P - Toggle Pause

If your points go bellow zero points or you the mob gets you, you lose!

Third party assets used:

Toon Colors Pro

If you have issues with the WebGL version of the game, here's the Windows version (it wasn't letting us put the WebGL and Windows version at the same time for some reason): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1AxVxboM4b0ZA3AEpugN4SN5PE2AFc9Uy/view?usp=shari...
